synopsis.text: Shiina, Ayame, Kayo, and Yumine welcome Tamaki Honda, a first-year high school student, to the unique SNS Club, where they collaborate to create self-published games known as doujin. As the newest member and illustrator, Tamaki embraces the opportunity to apply her artistic skills in this new venture. Together with the club's president and programmer Shiina, writer Ayame, and music composer Kayo, Tamaki navigates the intriguing world of game development. Along the way, she discovers the quirky personalities of her fellow club members and learns valuable lessons about teamwork and creativity. With deadlines looming and unique challenges to overcome, the SNS Club races against time to showcase their game at a major convention. Will Tamaki and her friends rise to the occasion and make their mark in the world of doujin games? Join them in this exciting and heartwarming journey!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
